channel.title: Need help to make own server
channel.description:
Hi im Mony and i need help on making my own server these are all the things i know so far: I have Router I need portForward I Will give the person who helps me get it online succesfully Co-owner I got a source I got Duc - from no-ip.com or the thign like that
What i need to know: How to port forward - dont just send me www.portforward.com cause that just got me real confused How to get my server online How to make a server.

item.title: Need help to make own server
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

Use your comp’s ip portforward and if people can’t login you port forwarded wrong to getting it running is in your compiler.bat and if you dont have a source get one

Read full topic
item.source: Need help to make own server
